justification: Proposal ignores Team B’s priorities (needs reliable producers, values RBs/possession WRs, and has injured TE). Offering a volatile WR (Sam Martin) and a low-tier, inconsistent TE (Ethan Turner) for B’s Tier 2 RB (Josh Flores) is misaligned. Calling Mason Mitchell a ‘more stable WR’ is inaccurate (deep threat, Q-tag, Tier 4). Rationale is A-centric, generic, and not grounded in roster/context specifics.
